    • Uses of Scene in scenes

      Subclasses of Scene in scenes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BattleField
      A scene where heros fight monsters
      class  Camp
      A place where hero's can upgrade their weapons health etc.
      class  Death
      represents the death screen for when your hero dies
      class  Instructions
      The place where player's can learn about the game.
      class  Pause
      A quick scene that allows temporary stoppage of the battle in battlefeild
      class  TitleScreen
      The main screen that players see when the game starts.
